name: Don't Pop (Feidry, reptilianalien)
description:
Mobile game where you play as a balloon and your goal is to not pop! Navigate the dangerous object filled sky to rack a high score.

Now available on the Google Play store!

Controls:

Click and drag to move in that direction

Or use WASD (WASD is better)

This game is totally free, no ads. My teammate and I made this game in 2 weeks and we're pretty proud of the level of polish we were able to achieve. Let us know what you think!
